title: Milder winter weather impacts outdoor activities in Toronto - Video - CityNews Toronto
text: Toronto The latest updates and breaking news, now available around the clock. Check back in with us at any time to find out what's happening, and always be the first to know. CityNews, Everywhere. One person is fighting for their life after a major crash involving at least five vehicles in Brampton. CityNews Leah Johansen reports from Queen Street and Goreway Drive as police investigate exactly what happened. 1h ago Startling numbers released by the Ontario Provincial Police stating that more than 10 thousand charges were laid for impaired related-offences this year. An alleged sexual assault in Toronto and another in Whitby are prompting concerns about ride share safety. Michelle Mackey is speaking with Uber as it launches a new safety feature in some cities. CityNews' Sports Reporter speaks to members of Toronto's PWHL team about the puck dropping on their historic season on January 1st. 2h ago CityNews’ Sports Reporter speaks to members of Toronto’s PWHL team about the puck dropping on their historic season on January 1st. In the fourth story of our five-part ‘Transit 2024’ series, Nick Westoll tours the Hazel McCallion LRT line in Mississauga and Brampton and gets a project update. 18h ago In the third story of the five-part ‘Transit 2024’ series, Nick Westoll tours the Finch West LRT line. Metrolinx officials say they’re “very confident” the line will open by the end of 2024 due to recent progress. It was supposed to be open in 2023. The Blue Jays have reportedly signed a fan favourite plus a mini Raptors reunion in Miami on Christmas Day. 9h ago Couple who opened the diner, raised their kids there and survived the pandemic say: “It was the right time, and we are ready to go.” In the second of a five-part series called ‘Transit 2024,’ Nick Westoll visits Exhibition station to get an update on the Ontario Line. Police are sharing very few details about whether a large discovery of gold during a Montreal firearms raid has any connection to the gold that went missing earlier from Pearson Airport. David Zura explains. It’s been a year full of blockbuster movies like Barbie and Oppenheimer. Film Critic James Mackin ranks the top 10 of 2023. 4h ago We all know about Barbie and Oppenheimer, but there are some other great movies that flew under the radar in 2023. Film Critic James Mackin helps build your holiday binge-watch list. 6h ago Nearly four years after the pandemic began, COVID-19 continues to circulate in Canada. Melissa Nakhavoly with how the virus could impact our lives in 2024. The imminent dawning of a new year finds Ukraine still in the midst of war. Melissa Duggan with how the country is preparing for the next phase of battle. 2023 marks the 30th anniversary of Kwanzaa being celebrated in Canada! As festivities continue, Afua Baah takes a closer look at the cultural significance of the week-long holiday celebration. 22h ago The American government started taking UFO sightings seriously in 2023. Richard Southern with what we learned, and what still remains unknown. 8h ago The usually bustling town of Bethlehem resembles a ghost town on Christmas Eve. Brie Davis on the solemn celebrations, as Israel’s prime minister vows to keep fighting until victorious.
